title: Rippling | L7 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE from Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 4
Prev Base Salary: 80 LPA
Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
Company: Rippling
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 1.06 CR INR
Perf Bonus: ~12 Lac INR
Stock bonus: 80 Lac INR Vested over 4 years
Benefits: Unlimited Paid leaves, Cab, food, relocation and all standard benefits
